title: We make modern websites
text: Having a web presence in today’s digital landscape is a must. While we develop with performance in mind, we have dedicated Ui designers ready to meet with you to ensure the look and feel of your website inspires your visitors and represents your brand.

bullet.text: Say goodbye to templates! Stand out from your competitors and make your brand like no other.
Split up web traffic between different designs and test out what works best
Our Ui designers focus on positive user experiences when it comes to web design.

title: Safety
text: Malicious users on the web steal personal information, bring down sites, and exploit fundamental security flaws in web servers. We deliver your sites using serverless technology called a CDN. Sites like Facebook, Netflix, and Amazon use Content delivery networks over servers for their security, cost, and reliability

bullet.text: Information is handled using microservice api’s to outsource data, analytics, user info into the cloud
No server means no malicious requests, DDOS attacks, or personal data leakage.
Users can download sites anywhere from a phone,tablet,or desktop just like an app.

title: Discover the power of serverless technology
text: Gatsby sites are fundamentally different from today's sites. All gatsby sites are progressive web apps that are inherently faster, more secure, and recognized as the most accessible web framework for impaired users by WebAIM.

bullet.text: Consistently  scores 98-100  on SEO, performance, and accessibility on google benchmark tests
When your traffic drops so should your hosting cost.
Progressive web apps can be installed on your phone, desktop, and taskbar as a web app.

title: Manage and control your site after development
text: You can stay in control of your site’s content and make changes without spending a dime on revisions. Sites built on the Gatsby cloud integrate with CMS platforms like WordPress or Contentful to pull content. Thanks to continuous integration your site will update with no downtime.

bullet.text: Use tools you are familiar with like wordpress to edit your apps content on the fly.
Be able to regularly post blogs and articles to interact with your sites visitors and drive user engagement.
Update your site anytime with out it going down. All updates automatically merge into existing builds
